Welcome to Arm Art

1921-1935
Art Department of State Museum

The National Gallery of Armenia was founded in 1921 by the decision of the Soviet Armenian Government, as the Art Department, one of the five departments of the State Museum.

1935-1947
The State Fine Art Museum

The Art Institute of Armenia collects, preserves, and interprets works of art of the highest quality, representing the worldâ€™s diverse artistic traditions, for the inspiration.

1947-1991
The State Gallery of Armenia

Arm-Art Gallery represents unique artworks of the modern painters from Europe and Armenia, whose paintings may be found in museums and private collections all around the world.

1991-2011
The National Gallery of Armenia

Stately art museum with ancient & modern pieces from Armenian, European, Russian & Asian artists.

I saw Tigran's childhood paintings on display at the Children's Art Museum in Yerevan. The haunting images of those paintings are seared in my mind forever.

James Arthur / Director
